project.title: eXBatch Enrolment System
project.description: The eXBatch Enrolment System is a comprehensive web application designed to modernize and automate the batch number enrolment process for materials supplied by Toll into the EXACT system. The system eliminates manual processes, reduces errors, and provides a structured workflow for submitting, reviewing, and approving batch enrolment requests across different organizational departments.

userManagement.title: User Management
items: Multi-role Support: Admin, Approver, and Requestor roles with distinct privileges
User Account Management: Complete user lifecycle including activation/deactivation
Department Association: Users linked to specific departments for workflow control

coreFunctionality.title: Core Functionality
items: Batch Number Management: Complete lifecycle management of batch enrolments from submission to approval
Real-time Integration: Direct synchronization with EXACT system for data validation and record creation
Duplicate Prevention: Automated validation to prevent duplicate entries in the EXACT system

reportingAnalytics.title: Reporting & Analytics
items: Dashboard Analytics: Real-time statistics and activity monitoring
Request Tracking: Comprehensive tracking of request status and history
Export Capabilities: PDF export functionality with filtering options
Activity Logging: Detailed audit trail of all system activities
